title: HUGE
text:
This is a nice place in the middle of the city center.

Airy and pleasant with sale of products on the spot, you can also of course eat lots of dishes.
Huge salads home made with fresh products, huge dishes with meat also which you can choose directly at the counter.

The only bad thing was that, despte of lots of tables empty all time we were there (which was the opposite of what the waiter told us), we were seated at the bar...

title: Deep immersion back in history
text:
Breathtaking place; deep historical inprint.

Very well explained trought the pannels.

You have a nice vieuw of Athens and up to the sea.

title: Taste, huge service, huge portions
text:
This is THE PLACE TO EAT!
The food is delicious, home made, served quickly, withh very good advice.

You have huge amount in your plate, don't eat with your eyes :-)

The prices are very low, you'll find your happyness without empty your wallet.

title: Easy available, service, smile
text:
Nice little hotel, at 40 minutes by tram from the center near the sea.
The owner and employees are very available at any time, helpfull.

There's a breakfast with some home made food but no fruits.

You can check in at any time (even in the middle at the night).

title: This city is plenty of magnificence
text:
A lot of people don't know much about this city.
Long time confused as Budapest, Bucharest has it's own history.

Along the "Old Bucharest" you will find the remains of the past, in the splendid Orthodox churches preserved as before.

Also, the "New Bucharest" will blow your mind away with the bars on the pedestrian district where nightlife has airs of smyles and happiness..
